item.title: Block Flash and Java in your browser today
item.description: If you haven’t heard about the wave of security issues caused by Java and Flash in recent months, you must be living under a rock. Attackers are getting smarter by delivering more 0-day exploits that fly under the radar of traditional A/V products and patches from the vendors are lagging behind. How can you attack the problem in the meantime? Be smart and only enable Flash and Java for the sites you explicitly trust.
